Ãƒâ€º             WinEdt is a powerful and versatile text editor for               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Windows with a strong predisposition towards the                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             creation of [La]TeX documents.                                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º                                                                              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             WinEdt is used as a front-end for compilers and                  Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             typesetting systems, such as TeX or HTML. WinEdt's               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             highlighting schemes can be customized for different             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             modes and its spell checking functionality supports              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             multi-lingual setups, with dictionaries (word-lists)             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             for many languages available for downloading from                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             WinEdt's Community Site www.winedt.org                           Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º                                                                              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Although WinEdt is reasonably suitable as an                     Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             all-purpose text editor it has been specifically                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             designed and configured to integrate seamlessly with             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             a TeX System (such as MiKTeX or TeX Live). WinEdt                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             documentation does not cover TeX related topics in               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             depth. You'll find introductions and manuals on                  Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             typesetting with [La]TeX, as well as links to other              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             recommended accessories, on TeX's Community Site                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             (TUG).                                                           Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º                                                                              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Major new features in WinEdt 7.0:                                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * WinEdt 7 is a unicode editor. It is compiled with              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               Delphi XE and heavily optimized in order to match              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               the performance of earlier non-unicode versions of             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               WinEdt...                                                      Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Up-to-date documentation (including an updated                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               Macro Manual and a brand new Configuration Manual)             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               is now consolidated in a single help file                      Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               (available from the Help menu).                                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * A new Preferences Dialog has been introduced to                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               allow most common customizations (for users that               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               are intimidated by the more powerful Options                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               Interface and Configuration Scripts).                          Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Graphic controls (like toolbars and menu items)                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               now use transparent png images instead of bitmaps.             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Default settings have numerous improvements                    Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               (including enhanced compilation and preview                    Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               macros, new highlighting schemes, etc.).                       Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * And there is more...                                           Ãƒâ€º
